item.title: Slack Best Practices
item.description: Posts Staying organized using Slack Post feature (Hidden behind the lightning bolt symbol) Create ToDos, Future Log, Daily Log Emjoi 👀 (:eyes:) I’m looking into it ✅ (:white_check_mark:) Complete or approved 🙏 (:pray:) Please or thank you 🙇 (:woman-bowing:) Thank you ➕ (:heavy_plus_sign:) I agree 👌 (:ok_hand:) OK! Or, I understand 👋 (:wave:) Hello! Or, I can help you with that 🙌 (:raised_hands:) Yeah! ♻️ (:recycle:) Rework comments provided Additional icons for MR review When you need it by 🕔 (:clock5:) End of day or select 🕘 (:clock9: - clock9).
